questions.question: MS Dhoni announced his retirement from international cricket in 2020.
Mahela Jayawardene retired from all forms of cricket before Kumar Sangakkara.
Alastair Cook is England's leading run-scorer in Test cricket.
Misbah-ul-Haq retired as Pakistan's oldest Test captain.
Shane Watson retired from international cricket but continued playing in T20 leagues.
Brendon McCullum never played Test cricket for New Zealand.
Yuvraj Singh was part of India's 2011 World Cup winning team.
Graeme Smith retired as South Africa's most successful Test captain.
Daniel Vettori was New Zealand's leading wicket-taker in Tests when he retired.
Hashim Amla retired with the highest Test batting average among South African batsmen.
